allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: correct skillLevel type in profile edit page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: improve story card export quality

- Increase export scale from 2x to 3x for sharper images
- Add quality: 1 for maximum PNG quality
- Increase preview card size from 256x450 to 288x504

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add system dark mode support

- Enable dark mode in Tailwind config \(follows system preference\)
- Add dark mode styles to dashboard, profile, profile edit pages
- Add dark mode to bottom navigation
- Dark backgrounds, cards, text, and form fields

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
